name: General Shale, Inc.
description: General Shale, Inc. is a prominent manufacturer and supplier of brick and masonry products in North America. Founded in 1928, the company has established itself as a leader in the brick industry, offering a wide variety of high-quality products that are known for their durability, aesthetic appeal, and energy efficiency. General Shale is committed to sustainable manufacturing practices, utilizing state-of-the-art technology to produce eco-friendly products that meet the demands of modern construction. Their extensive product portfolio includes traditional clay brick, concrete block, and a variety of specialty masonry products. With a strong focus on customer satisfaction, General Shale provides tailored solutions to contractors, architects, and homeowners, enhancing the beauty and functionality of both residential and commercial projects. The company operates numerous manufacturing plants and distribution centers across the United States and Canada, ensuring timely delivery and a reliable supply chain for its customers. General Shale also places a high emphasis on community involvement, supporting local initiatives and promoting educational programs in the construction industry. As they continue to innovate and expand their product offerings, General Shale remains dedicated to quality, sustainability, and customer service.

seo.meta_title: General Shale, Inc. | Leading Brick Manufacturer
seo.meta_description: Explore General Shale, Inc., a leading manufacturer of brick and masonry products in North America. Discover our commitment to quality and sustainability.

faq.question: What products does General Shale offer?
faq.answer: General Shale offers a variety of brick and masonry products, including clay brick, concrete block, and stone veneer.

faq.question: Where is General Shale headquartered?
faq.answer: General Shale is headquartered in Johnson City, Tennessee, USA.

faq.question: Who is the CEO of General Shale?
faq.answer: Kirk B. Lacy is the CEO of General Shale, Inc.

faq.question: Is General Shale committed to sustainability?
faq.answer: Yes, General Shale is committed to environmentally sustainable manufacturing practices.
